name: Flick That Ball Pro
description:
No Ads and SaveMe (Get a $14.99 value) and save.

Flick the Ball is super fun, challenging game, then you can test your flicking athletics. Watch soccer balls, footballs, basketballs, baseballs and tennis balls cross the screen. Flick the puck to knock down the other balls.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Flick That Ball! And give us a 5 Star Rating if you love the game. We would really really appreciate it.
